title: [Large-Scale] Context-Aware Ontology-Based Personalized e-Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and general understanding of social studies domains
context.additional_context: Social studies education requiring customized learning content delivery in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can identify personalized learning pathways reflecting individual contexts (learning styles, career goals, etc.) with over 80% accuracy
Learners are assessed on their ability to apply core social studies concepts (e.g., cultural change, social structure, policy analysis) to real cases through ontology-based recommendation systems
Learners complete at least two personalized assignments per week using context-aware learning modules in mobile environments and incorporate peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
